page.title: 13LOCAL NEWS
page.content: There are a lot of main events going on in our area like the reconstruction of the dallington road. The road had been worn away by heavy vehicles passing on their journeys. When we went down to see what they were doing, a big machine was laying and digging the road. The machine was big and very noisy but it did its job quickly and easily.Its inventors were pleased with its work and are hoping to make quite a few in the future. The most popular newspaper. In our school there are 1o6 people in the classes we left the youngest class out but asked classes 1,2,3. What their parents paper was. The most popular newspaper was the sussesx express, followed in popularity by the Bexhill news,Hastings Observer.Only rarely was Dallington mentioned in the papers except for details of the W.I.
